text: New Police Story () is a 2004 Hong Kong action movie produced and directed by Benny Chan, starring Jackie Chan (who also produced it). The movie was released in the Hong Kong on 24 September 2004. The movie is a reboot of the Police Story movie series and is the fifth movie. It stars Nicholas Tse, Charlie Yeung, Charlene Choi, Daniel Wu, and Ken Lo. At box office, this film did business of HK$21 million. == Other websites == * * * Category:2004 action movies Category:Hong Kong action movies Category:Chinese movies
title: New Police Story
